# zitadel_organization (Resource)

Resource representing an organization in ZITADEL, which is the highest level after the instance and contains several
other resource including policies if the configuration differs to the default policies on the instance.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the org

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `primary_domain` (String) Primary domain of the org
- `state` (String) State of the org
